subject: Skiing
Avalanches
Wilderness Areas
lead_paragraph: Fresh powder beckoned 16 expert skiers and snowboarders into the backcountry. Then a slab of snow cracked and swept violently down the mountain. No one knew how many were caught.
snippet: Fresh powder beckoned 16 expert skiers and snowboarders into the backcountry. Then a slab of snow cracked and swept violently down the mountain. No one knew how many were caught.
